trans-unit.source: Role based access control troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: Role based access control troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: Working with different resource types for role based access control.
trans-unit.target: Working with different resource types for role based access control.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Role based access control</linkText><title></title> is a powerful feature that allows you to delegate fine-grained access to resources in Azure.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Role based access control</linkText><title></title> is a powerful feature that allows you to delegate fine-grained access to resources in Azure.

trans-unit.source: This means you can feel confident granting a specific person the right to just exactly what they need.
trans-unit.target: This means you can feel confident granting a specific person the right to just exactly what they need.

trans-unit.source: However, at times the resource model for Azure resources can be complicated and it can be difficult to understand exactly what you are granting permissions to.
trans-unit.target: However, at times the resource model for Azure resources can be complicated and it can be difficult to understand exactly what you are granting permissions to.

trans-unit.source: This document will let you know what to expect when using some of the new roles in the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: This document will let you know what to expect when using some of the new roles in the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: There are three pre-built roles that are included in this release:
trans-unit.target: There are three pre-built roles that are included in this release:

trans-unit.source: Owner
trans-unit.target: Owner

trans-unit.source: Contributor
trans-unit.target: Contributor

trans-unit.source: Reader
trans-unit.target: Reader

trans-unit.source: Owners and contributors will have full access to the management experience, the difference being that a contributor can’t give access to other users or groups.
trans-unit.target: Owners and contributors will have full access to the management experience, the difference being that a contributor can’t give access to other users or groups.

trans-unit.source: Things get a little more interesting with the reader role, so that’s where we’ll spend some time.
trans-unit.target: Things get a little more interesting with the reader role, so that’s where we’ll spend some time.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>See this article</linkText><title></title> for details on how exactly to grant access.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>See this article</linkText><title></title> for details on how exactly to grant access.

trans-unit.source: If you grant a user, or yourself only have, read access to a single web app, then there may be some features that are disabled that you might not expect.
trans-unit.target: If you grant a user, or yourself only have, read access to a single web app, then there may be some features that are disabled that you might not expect.

trans-unit.source: The following management capabilities require write access to a web app (either Contributor or Owner), and won’t be available in any read only scenario.
trans-unit.target: The following management capabilities require write access to a web app (either Contributor or Owner), and won’t be available in any read only scenario.

trans-unit.source: Commands (e.g. start, stop, etc.)
trans-unit.target: Commands (e.g. start, stop, etc.)

trans-unit.source: Changing settings like general configuration, scale settings, backup settings, and monitoring settings.
trans-unit.target: Changing settings like general configuration, scale settings, backup settings, and monitoring settings.

trans-unit.source: Accessing publishing credentials and other secrets like app settings and connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Accessing publishing credentials and other secrets like app settings and connection strings.

trans-unit.source: Streaming logs
trans-unit.target: Streaming logs

trans-unit.source: Diagnostic logs configuration
trans-unit.target: Diagnostic logs configuration

trans-unit.source: Console (command prompt)
trans-unit.target: Console (command prompt)

trans-unit.source: Active and recent deployments (for local git continuous deployment)
trans-unit.target: Active and recent deployments (for local git continuous deployment)

trans-unit.source: Estimated spend
trans-unit.target: Estimated spend

trans-unit.source: Web tests
trans-unit.target: Web tests

trans-unit.source: Virtual network (only visible to a reader if a virtual network has previously been configured by a user with write access).
trans-unit.target: Virtual network (only visible to a reader if a virtual network has previously been configured by a user with write access).

trans-unit.source: If you can't access any of these tiles, you'll need to have Contributor access to the web app.
trans-unit.target: If you can't access any of these tiles, you'll need to have Contributor access to the web app.

trans-unit.source: Web apps are complicated by the presence of a few different resources that interplay.
trans-unit.target: Web apps are complicated by the presence of a few different resources that interplay.

trans-unit.source: Here is a typical resource group with a couple websites:
trans-unit.target: Here is a typical resource group with a couple websites:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Web app resource group</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Web app resource group</linkText>

trans-unit.source: As a result, if you grant someone access to just the website, much functionality on the website blade will be completely disabled.
trans-unit.target: As a result, if you grant someone access to just the website, much functionality on the website blade will be completely disabled.

trans-unit.source: These items require access to the App Service plan that corresponds to your website:
trans-unit.target: These items require access to the App Service plan that corresponds to your website:

trans-unit.source: Viewing the web app’s pricing tier (e.g. Free or Standard).
trans-unit.target: Viewing the web app’s pricing tier (e.g. Free or Standard).

trans-unit.source: Scale configuration (i.e. # of instances, virtual machine size, autoscale settings).
trans-unit.target: Scale configuration (i.e. # of instances, virtual machine size, autoscale settings).

trans-unit.source: Quotas (e.g. Storage, bandwidth, CPU).
trans-unit.target: Quotas (e.g. Storage, bandwidth, CPU).

trans-unit.source: These items require access to the whole Resource group that contains your website:
trans-unit.target: These items require access to the whole Resource group that contains your website:

trans-unit.source: SSL Certificates and bindings (This is because SSL certificates can be shared between sites in the same resource group and geo-location).
trans-unit.target: SSL Certificates and bindings (This is because SSL certificates can be shared between sites in the same resource group and geo-location).

trans-unit.source: Alert rules
trans-unit.target: Alert rules

trans-unit.source: Autoscale settings
trans-unit.target: Autoscale settings

trans-unit.source: Application insights components
trans-unit.target: Application insights components

trans-unit.source: Web tests
trans-unit.target: Web tests

trans-unit.source: Much like with web apps, some features on the virtual machine blade require write access to the virtual machine, or to other resources in the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Much like with web apps, some features on the virtual machine blade require write access to the virtual machine, or to other resources in the resource group.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machines have these related resources:
trans-unit.target: Virtual machines have these related resources:

trans-unit.source: Domain names
trans-unit.target: Domain names

trans-unit.source: Virtual networks
trans-unit.target: Virtual networks

trans-unit.source: Storage accounts
trans-unit.target: Storage accounts

trans-unit.source: Alert rules
trans-unit.target: Alert rules

trans-unit.source: These items require write access to the Virtual machine:
trans-unit.target: These items require write access to the Virtual machine:

trans-unit.source: Endpoints
trans-unit.target: Endpoints

trans-unit.source: IP addresses
trans-unit.target: IP addresses

trans-unit.source: Disks
trans-unit.target: Disks

trans-unit.source: Extensions
trans-unit.target: Extensions

trans-unit.source: These require write access to both the Virtual machine, and the Resource group (along with the Domain name) that it is in:
trans-unit.target: These require write access to both the Virtual machine, and the Resource group (along with the Domain name) that it is in:

trans-unit.source: Availability set
trans-unit.target: Availability set

trans-unit.source: Load balanced set
trans-unit.target: Load balanced set

trans-unit.source: Alert rules
trans-unit.target: Alert rules

trans-unit.source: If you can't access any of these tiles, you'll need to ask your administrator for Contributor access to the Resource group.
trans-unit.target: If you can't access any of these tiles, you'll need to ask your administrator for Contributor access to the Resource group.
